6243768Di2015UniqueSeparator    private string parseNode(TreeNode tn)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        using (var writer = XmlWriter.Create(sb))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteStartElement("xml");Di2015NewLine            parseNode(tn, writer);Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteEndElement();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private void parseNode(TreeNode tn, XmlWriter writer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (tn.Nodes.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteStartElement(tn.Text);Di2015NewLine            foreach (TreeNode child in tn.Nodes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                parseNode(child, writer);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteEndElement();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteString(tn.Text);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6244908Di2015UniqueSeparatorlog2(M*N)
6244908Di2015UniqueSeparatorint[] Ms = new int[] { 10, 11, 12, 13 };Di2015NewLineint N = 42;Di2015NewLineSystem.Numerics.BigInteger x = new System.Numerics.BigInteger();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSystem.Numerics.BigInteger power = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// composing the pack:Di2015NewLineforeach (int s in Ms) {Di2015NewLine    x += power * s;Di2015NewLine    power *= N;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// reading the pack:Di2015NewLine//  extracting i'th number:Di2015NewLineint i = 2;Di2015NewLinepower = System.Numerics.BigInteger.Pow(N, i);Di2015NewLineint result = (int)((x / power) % N);Di2015NewLine

6245333Di2015UniqueSeparator  private bool CheckForValidProxyAddress(string address)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //create our match patternDi2015NewLine        //string pattern = @"^([1-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9][0-9]|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])(\\.([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9][0-9]|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])){3}$:([0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9])";Di2015NewLine        string pattern = @"\\b(25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)\\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)\\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)\\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9][0-9]?)\\b\\:[0-9]{0,4}";Di2015NewLine        //create our Regular Expression objectDi2015NewLine        Regex check = new Regex(pattern);Di2015NewLine        //boolean variable to hold the statusDi2015NewLine        bool valid = false;Di2015NewLine        //check to make sure an ip address was providedDi2015NewLine        if (address == "")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //no address provided so return falseDi2015NewLine            valid = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //address provided so use the IsMatch MethodDi2015NewLine            //of the Regular Expression objectDi2015NewLine            valid = check.IsMatch(address, 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //return the resultsDi2015NewLine        return valid;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6247593Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void FirstPrime(int limit)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stopwatch sw = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine        sw.Start();Di2015NewLine        bool[] composite = new bool[limit];Di2015NewLine        long sum = 0;Di2015NewLine        int count = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 3; i < limit; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (i % 2 == 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!composite[i])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ++count;Di2015NewLine                    sum += i;Di2015NewLine                    for (int j = i; j < limit; j += 2 * i)Di2015NewLine                        composite[j] = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        count++;Di2015NewLine        sum += 2;Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("There are " + count + " prime numbers less than " + limit + " totalling " + sum);Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Time elapsed: {0}",sw.Elapsed);Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6249810Di2015UniqueSeparator    static HtmlSanitizer()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Whitelist = new Dictionary<string, string[]> {Di2015NewLine            { "a", new[] { "href" } },Di2015NewLine            { "strong", null },Di2015NewLine            { "em", null },Di2015NewLine            { "blockquote", null },Di2015NewLine            { "b", null},Di2015NewLine            { "p", null},Di2015NewLine            { "ul", null},Di2015NewLine            { "ol", null},Di2015NewLine            { "li", null},Di2015NewLine            { "div", new[] { "align" } },Di2015NewLine            { "strike", null},Di2015NewLine            { "u", null},                Di2015NewLine            { "sub", null},Di2015NewLine            { "sup", null},Di2015NewLine            { "table", null },Di2015NewLine            { "tr", null },Di2015NewLine            { "td", null },Di2015NewLine            { "th", null }Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string Sanitize(string input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (input.Trim().Length < 1)Di2015NewLine            return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        var htmlDocument = new HtmlDocument();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        htmlDocument.LoadHtml(input);            Di2015NewLine        SanitizeNode(htmlDocument.DocumentNode);Di2015NewLine        string xPath = HtmlSanitizer.CreateXPath();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return StripHtml(htmlDocument.DocumentNode.WriteTo().Trim(), xPath);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void SanitizeChildren(HtmlNode parentNode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = parentNode.ChildNodes.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SanitizeNode(parentNode.ChildNodes[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void SanitizeNode(HtmlNode node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (node.NodeType == HtmlNodeType.Element)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!Whitelist.ContainsKey(node.Name))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!DeletableNodesXpath.Contains(node.Name))Di2015NewLine                {                       Di2015NewLine                    //DeletableNodesXpath.Add(node.Name.Replace("?",""));Di2015NewLine                    node.Name = "removeableNode";Di2015NewLine                    DeletableNodesXpath.Add(node.Name);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (node.HasChildNodes)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    SanitizeChildren(node);Di2015NewLine                }                  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (node.HasAttributes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int i = node.Attributes.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    HtmlAttribute currentAttribute = node.Attributes[i];Di2015NewLine                    string[] allowedAttributes = Whitelist[node.Name];Di2015NewLine                    if (allowedAttributes != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (!allowedAttributes.Contains(currentAttribute.Name))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            node.Attributes.Remove(currentAttribute);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        node.Attributes.Remove(currentAttribute);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (node.HasChildNodes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SanitizeChildren(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string StripHtml(string html, string xPath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HtmlDocument htmlDoc = new HtmlDocument();Di2015NewLine        htmlDoc.LoadHtml(html);Di2015NewLine        if (xPath.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            HtmlNodeCollection invalidNodes = htmlDoc.DocumentNode.SelectNodes(@xPath);Di2015NewLine            foreach (HtmlNode node in invalidNodes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                node.ParentNode.RemoveChild(node, true);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return htmlDoc.DocumentNode.WriteContentTo(); ;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string CreateXPath()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string _xPath = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < DeletableNodesXpath.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (i != DeletableNodesXpath.Count - 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _xPath += string.Format("//{0}|", DeletableNodesXpath[i].ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else _xPath += string.Format("//{0}", DeletableNodesXpath[i].ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return _xPath;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6251688Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Bitmap MakeGrayscale(Bitmap original)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine    //make an empty bitmap the same size as originalDi2015NewLine    Bitmap newBitmap = new Bitmap(original.Width, original.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   for (int i = 0; i < original.Width; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       for (int j = 0; j < original.Height; j++)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine          //get the pixel from the original imageDi2015NewLine          Color originalColor = original.GetPixel(i, j);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         //create the grayscale version of the pixelDi2015NewLine          int grayScale = (int)((originalColor.R * .3) + (originalColor.G * .59)Di2015NewLine              + (originalColor.B * .11));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         //create the color objectDi2015NewLine          Color newColor =  Color.FromArgb(grayScale, grayScale, grayScale);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          //set the new image's pixel to the grayscale versionDi2015NewLine          newBitmap.SetPixel(i, j, newColor);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return newBitmap;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine
6251688Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Bitmap MakeGrayscale2(Bitmap original)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine    unsafeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       //create an empty bitmap the same size as originalDi2015NewLine       Bitmap newBitmap = new Bitmap(original.Width, original.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //lock the original bitmap in memoryDi2015NewLine       BitmapData originalData = original.LockBits(Di2015NewLine          new Rectangle(0, 0, original.Width, original.Height),Di2015NewLine          ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //lock the new bitmap in memoryDi2015NewLine       BitmapData newData = newBitmap.LockBits(Di2015NewLine          new Rectangle(0, 0, original.Width, original.Height), Di2015NewLine         ImageLockMode.WriteOnly, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       //set the number of bytes per pixelDi2015NewLine       int pixelSize = 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      for (int y = 0; y < original.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine          //get the data from the original imageDi2015NewLine          byte* oRow = (byte*)originalData.Scan0 + (y * originalData.Stride);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         //get the data from the new imageDi2015NewLine          byte* nRow = (byte*)newData.Scan0 + (y * newData.Stride);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         for (int x = 0; x < original.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine             //create the grayscale versionDi2015NewLine             byte grayScale = Di2015NewLine               (byte)((oRow[x * pixelSize] * .11) + //BDi2015NewLine                (oRow[x * pixelSize + 1] * .59) +  //GDi2015NewLine                (oRow[x * pixelSize + 2] * .3)); //RDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //set the new image's pixel to the grayscale versionDi2015NewLine             nRow[x * pixelSize] = grayScale; //BDi2015NewLine             nRow[x * pixelSize + 1] = grayScale; //GDi2015NewLine             nRow[x * pixelSize + 2] = grayScale; //RDi2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //unlock the bitmapsDi2015NewLine       newBitmap.UnlockBits(newData);Di2015NewLine       original.UnlockBits(originalData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return newBitmap;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine
6251688Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Bitmap MakeGrayscale3(Bitmap original)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine    //create a blank bitmap the same size as originalDi2015NewLine    Bitmap newBitmap = new Bitmap(original.Width, original.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //get a graphics object from the new imageDi2015NewLine    Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(newBitmap);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //create the grayscale ColorMatrixDi2015NewLine    ColorMatrix colorMatrix = new ColorMatrix(Di2015NewLine       new float[][] Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          new float[] {.3f, .3f, .3f, 0, 0},Di2015NewLine          new float[] {.59f, .59f, .59f, 0, 0},Di2015NewLine          new float[] {.11f, .11f, .11f, 0, 0},Di2015NewLine          new float[] {0, 0, 0, 1, 0},Di2015NewLine          new float[] {0, 0, 0, 0, 1}Di2015NewLine       });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //create some image attributesDi2015NewLine    ImageAttributes attributes = new ImageAttributes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //set the color matrix attributeDi2015NewLine    attributes.SetColorMatrix(colorMatrix);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //draw the original image on the new imageDi2015NewLine    //using the grayscale color matrixDi2015NewLine    g.DrawImage(original, new Rectangle(0, 0, original.Width, original.Height),Di2015NewLine       0, 0, original.Width, original.Height, GraphicsUnit.Pixel, attributes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //dispose the Graphics objectDi2015NewLine    g.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    return newBitmap;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

6253879Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RootNode : TreeNodeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public List<ChildNode> ChildNodes { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public RootNode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ChildNodes = new List<ChildNode>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void PopulateChildren()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Nodes.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var visibleNodes = Di2015NewLine            ChildNodesDi2015NewLine            .Where(x => x.Visible)Di2015NewLine            .ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.Nodes.AddRange(visibleNodes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //you would use this instead of (Nodes.Add)Di2015NewLine    public void AddNode(ChildNode node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!ChildNodes.Contains(node))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            node.ParentNode = this;Di2015NewLine            ChildNodes.Add(node);Di2015NewLine            PopulateChildren();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //you would use this instead of (Nodes.Remove)Di2015NewLine    public void RemoveNode(ChildNode node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ChildNodes.Contains(node))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            node.ParentNode = null;Di2015NewLine            ChildNodes.Remove(node);Di2015NewLine            PopulateChildren();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ChildNode : TreeNodeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public RootNode ParentNode { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    private bool visible;Di2015NewLine    public bool Visible { get { return visible; } set { visible = value;OnVisibleChanged(): } }Di2015NewLine    private void OnVisibleChanged()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ParentNode != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ParentNode.PopulateChildren();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6260691Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T BytesToStruct<T>(byte[] bytes) where T : structDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    AssertUtilities.ArgumentNotNull(bytes, "bytes");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var structSize = Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    var pointer = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        pointer = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(structSize);Di2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(bytes, 0, pointer, structSize);Di2015NewLine        return (T)Marshal.PtrToStructure(pointer, typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (pointer != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            Marshal.FreeHGlobal(pointer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static byte[] StructToBytes<T>(T structObject) where T : structDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var structSize = Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    var bytes = new byte[structSize];Di2015NewLine    var pointer = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        pointer = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(structSize);Di2015NewLine        Marshal.StructureToPtr(structObject, pointer, true);Di2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(pointer, bytes, 0, structSize);Di2015NewLine        return bytes;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (pointer != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine            Marshal.FreeHGlobal(pointer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6270056Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring GetColumnName<T,TResult>(Expression<Func<T,TResult>> property)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var member = GetMemberExpression(property.Body);Di2015NewLine    if (member == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Not reducible to a Member Access", Di2015NewLine                                    "property");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return member.Member.Name;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineMemberExpression GetMemberExpression(Expression body)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var candidates = new Queue<Expression>();Di2015NewLine    candidates.Enqueue(body);Di2015NewLine    while (candidates.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var expr = candidates.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        if (expr is MemberExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ((MemberExpression)expr);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (expr is UnaryExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            candidates.Enqueue(((UnaryExpression)expr).Operand);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (expr is BinaryExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var binary = expr as BinaryExpression;Di2015NewLine            candidates.Enqueue(binary.Left);Di2015NewLine            candidates.Enqueue(binary.Right);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (expr is MethodCallExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var method = expr as MethodCallExpression;Di2015NewLine            foreach (var argument in method.Arguments)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                candidates.Enqueue(argument);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (expr is LambdaExpression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            candidates.Enqueue(((LambdaExpression)expr).Body);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6280557Di2015UniqueSeparatorinterface IChangeableSkin : ISkinDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    event EventHandler SkinChanged;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SkinProxy : IChangeableSkin Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private ISkin _skin; // actual underlying skinDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void SetSkin(ISkin newSkin)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (newSkin == null)Di2015NewLine           throw new ArgumentNullException("newSkin");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (newSkin == _skin)Di2015NewLine           return; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region IChangeableSkin membersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event EventHandler SkinChanged = delegate { }; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #regionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6281193Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T2[][] ToMultidimensionalArray<T, T2>(Di2015NewLine                                                this IEnumerable<T> enumerable,Di2015NewLine                                                int count,Di2015NewLine                                                params string[] propNames)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T2[][] resultArray = new T2[count][];Di2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLine    int arrLength = propNames.Length;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in enumerable)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        resultArray[i] = new T2[arrLength];Di2015NewLine        int j = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (string prop in propNames)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get the required property info using reflectionDi2015NewLine            var propertyInfo = typeof(T).GetProperty(prop);Di2015NewLine            // Extract the getter method of the propertyDi2015NewLine            var getter = propertyInfo.GetGetMethod();Di2015NewLine            // Invoke the getter and get the property valueDi2015NewLine            var value = getter.Invoke(item, null);Di2015NewLine            // Cast the value to T2 and store in the arrayDi2015NewLine            resultArray[i][j] = (T2) value;Di2015NewLine            j++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        i++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return resultArray;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6286077Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass UtilityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  static readonly string[] BitPatterns ;Di2015NewLine  static Utility()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    BitPatterns = new string[256] ;Di2015NewLine    for ( int i = 0 ; i < 256 ; ++i )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      char[] chars = new char[8] ;Di2015NewLine      for ( byte j = 0 , mask = 0x80 ; mask != 0x00 ; ++j , mask >>= 1 )Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        chars[j] = ( 0 == (i&mask) ? 6289205Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  /* Connection to Active DirectoryDi2015NewLine   */Di2015NewLine  DirectoryEntry deBase = new DirectoryEntry("LDAP://WM2008R2ENT:389/dc=dom,dc=fr");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /* To find all the groups that "user1" is a member of :Di2015NewLine   * Set the base to the groups container DN; for example root DN (dc=dom,dc=fr) Di2015NewLine   * Set the scope to subtreeDi2015NewLine   * Use the following filter :Di2015NewLine   * (member:1.2.840.113556.1.4.1941:=cn=user1,cn=users,DC=x)Di2015NewLine   */Di2015NewLine  DirectorySearcher dsLookFor = new DirectorySearcher(deBase);Di2015NewLine  dsLookFor.Filter = "(member:1.2.840.113556.1.4.1941:=CN=user1 Users,OU=MonOu,DC=dom,DC=fr)";Di2015NewLine  dsLookFor.SearchScope = SearchScope.Subtree;Di2015NewLine  dsLookFor.PropertiesToLoad.Add("cn");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  SearchResultCollection srcGroups = dsLookFor.FindAll();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /* Just to know if user is explicitly in groupDi2015NewLine   */Di2015NewLine  foreach (SearchResult srcGroup in srcGroups)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("{0}", srcGroup.Path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (string property in srcGroup.Properties.PropertyNames)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine("\\t{0} : {1} ", property, srcGroup.Properties[property][0]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DirectoryEntry aGroup = new DirectoryEntry(srcGroup.Path);Di2015NewLine    DirectorySearcher dsLookForAMermber = new DirectorySearcher(aGroup);Di2015NewLine    dsLookForAMermber.Filter = "(member=CN=user1 Users,OU=MonOu,DC=dom,DC=fr)";Di2015NewLine    dsLookForAMermber.SearchScope = SearchScope.Base;Di2015NewLine    dsLookForAMermber.PropertiesToLoad.Add("cn");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SearchResultCollection memberInGroup = dsLookForAMermber.FindAll();Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Find the user {0}", memberInGroup.Count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6293442Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Parses the supplied enum and string value to find an associated enum value (case sensitive).Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static object Parse(Type type, string stringValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Parse(type, stringValue, false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Parses the supplied enum and string value to find an associated enum value.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static object Parse(Type type, string stringValue, bool ignoreCase)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object output = null;Di2015NewLine        string enumStringValue = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!type.IsEnum)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException(String.Format("Supplied type must be an Enum.  Type was {0}", type));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Look for our string value associated with fields in this enumDi2015NewLine        foreach (FieldInfo fi in type.GetFields())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Check for our custom attributeDi2015NewLine            var attrs = fi.GetCustomAttributes(typeof (StringValueAttribute), false) as StringValueAttribute[];Di2015NewLine            if (attrs != null && attrs.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                enumStringValue = attrs[0].Value;Di2015NewLine            }                       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Check for equality then select actual enum value.Di2015NewLine            if (string.Compare(enumStringValue, stringValue, ignoreCase) == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                output = Enum.Parse(type, fi.Name);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return output;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
6293442Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets a string value for a particular enum value.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static string GetStringValue(Enum value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string output = null;Di2015NewLine        Type type = value.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (StringValues.ContainsKey(value))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            output = ((StringValueAttribute) StringValues[value]).Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Look for our 'StringValueAttribute' in the field's custom attributesDi2015NewLine            FieldInfo fi = type.GetField(value.ToString());Di2015NewLine            var attributes = fi.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(StringValueAttribute), false);Di2015NewLine            if (attributes.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var attribute = (StringValueAttribute) attributes[0];Di2015NewLine                StringValues.Add(value, attribute);Di2015NewLine                output = attribute.Value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return output;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6299708Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic override Int32 Next(Int32 minValue, Int32 maxValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (minValue > maxValue) Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("minValue");Di2015NewLine    if (minValue == maxValue) return minValue;Di2015NewLine    Int64 diff = maxValue - minValue;Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _rng.GetBytes(_uint32Buffer);Di2015NewLine        UInt32 rand = BitConverter.ToUInt32(_uint32Buffer, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Int64 max = (1 + (Int64)UInt32.MaxValue);Di2015NewLine        Int64 remainder = max % diff;Di2015NewLine        if (rand < max - remainder)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (Int32)(minValue + (rand % diff));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6299708Di2015UniqueSeparatorResults produced by calling Next() 1 000 000 times on my machine (dual core 3Ghz)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSystem.Random completed in 20.4993 ms (avg 0 ms) (first: 0.3454 ms)Di2015NewLineCryptoRandom with pool completed in 132.2408 ms (avg 0.0001 ms) (first: 0.025 ms)Di2015NewLineCryptoRandom without pool completed in 2 sec 587.708 ms (avg 0.0025 ms) (first: 1.4142 ms)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine|---------------------|------------------------------------|Di2015NewLine| Implementation      | Slowdown compared to System.Random |Di2015NewLine|---------------------|------------------------------------|Di2015NewLine| System.Random       | 0                                  |Di2015NewLine| CryptoRand w pool   | 6,6x                               |Di2015NewLine| CryptoRand w/o pool | 19,5x                              |Di2015NewLine|---------------------|------------------------------------|Di2015NewLine

("0" + offsetMinutes) : offsetMinutes.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return date + sign + offset;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

          // Let's set up a test case similar to the example in the questionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // We generate 5 AuthorsDi2015NewLine            Author[] authors = Seed(1, 5).Select(x => GenerateTestAuthor(x.ToString())).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // And 9 ArticlesDi2015NewLine            Article[] articles = Seed(1,9).Select(x => GenerateTestArticle(x.ToString())).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // This defines how articles are connected to authorsDi2015NewLine            int[] articleToAuthor = new[] authors[articleToAuthor[x]];});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Now 3 MagazinesDi2015NewLine            Magazine[] magazines = Seed(1,3).Select(x => GenerateTestMagazine(x.ToString())).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // This deines which articles go in which magazineDi2015NewLine            int[] articleToMagazine = new[] {0,0,0,1,1,1,2,2,2};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Let's add artices to the MagazinesDi2015NewLine            Seed(9).Foreach(x=> x.TOC.Foreach(z => z.Source = x));Di2015NewLine            return magazines.ToList();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static IEnumerable<int> Seed(int start, int 6306727Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<U> uSequence = new List<U>();Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<V> vSequence1 = uSequence.To(u => new V(u)); //Option 1 : explicit transformation, needs neither any interface nor explicit types (type inference at work)Di2015NewLine        IEnumerable<V> vSequence2 = uSequence.To<U, V>(); //Option 2 : implicit transformation internally supported from U to V by type V thanks to IBuildableFrom<TV, TU>, but you must precise To<U, V>() with the typesDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class Extensions    {Di2015NewLine    //Option 1Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<TV> To<TU, TV>(this IEnumerable<TU> source, Func<TU,TV> transform)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return source.Select(tu => transform(tu));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Option 2Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<TV> To<TU, TV>(this IEnumerable<TU> source) where TV : IBuildableFrom<TV, TU>, new()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return source.Select(tu => new TV().BuildFrom(tu));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface IBuildableFrom<TV, TU>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TV BuildFrom(TU tu);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class U { } //Cheesy concrete class playing the rle of TUDi2015NewLinepublic class V : IBuildableFrom<V, U> //Cheesy concrete class playing the rle of TVDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public V BuildFrom(U u)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Initialization of this' properties based on u's onesDi2015NewLine        return this;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public V(U u) { }//Used by option 1Di2015NewLine    public V() { } //Used by option 2Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6308746Di2015UniqueSeparatorTimer wakeSleepingIdsTimer = new Timer(Di2015NewLine   _ =>Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       DateTime utcNow = DateTime.UtcNow;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       // Pull all items from the sleeping queue that have been there for at least 2 secondsDi2015NewLine       foreach(string id in sleepingIds.TakeWhile(entry => (utcNow - entry.Item2).TotalSeconds >= 2))Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           // Add this id back to the processing queueDi2015NewLine           idsToProcess.Enqueue(id);Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine   },Di2015NewLine   null, // no stateDi2015NewLine   Timeout.Infinite, // no due timeDi2015NewLine   100 // wake up every 100ms, probably should read this from configDi2015NewLine );Di2015NewLine

6334485Di2015UniqueSeparatorGZipStream
6334485Di2015UniqueSeparator        //generating dataDi2015NewLine        int length = 100000;Di2015NewLine        byte[] data = new byte[length];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            data[i] = System.Convert.ToByte(i % 100 + i % 50);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] o;Di2015NewLine        //serialization into memory streamDi2015NewLine        IFormatter formatter = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine        using (var ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            formatter.Serialize(ms, data);Di2015NewLine            ms.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //GZip zipDi2015NewLine            using(MemoryStream compressedStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (var Compress = new GZipStream(compressedStream, CompressionMode.Compress, true))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ms.CopyTo(Compress);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                compressedStream.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine                //GZip UnzipDi2015NewLine          uncompressedStream.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine                    var oo = formatter.Deserialize(uncompressedStream);Di2015NewLine                    o = (byte[])oo;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //deserialization from memory streamDi2015NewLine            //POINT1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine 6338472Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic byte[] GenerateSaltedHash(string password, byte[] salt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  byte[] plainText = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(password);Di2015NewLine  HashAlgorithm algorithm = new SHA256Managed();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  byte[] plainTextWithSaltBytes = Di2015NewLine    new byte[plainText.Length + salt.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < plainText.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    plainTextWithSaltBytes[i] = plainText[i];Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  for (int i = 0; i < salt.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    plainTextWithSaltBytes[plainText.Length + i] = salt[i];Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  byte[] hash = algorithm.ComputeHash(plainTextWithSaltBytes);            Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6338472Di2015UniqueSeparator    public byte[] GenerateSalt(int length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        salt = new byte[length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Strong runtime pseudo-random number generator, on Windows uses CryptAPIDi2015NewLine        // on Unix /dev/urandomDi2015NewLine        RNGCryptoServiceProvider random = new RNGCryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        random.GetNonZeroBytes(salt);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return salt;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
6338472Di2015UniqueSeparator[MethodImpl(MethodImplOptions.NoInlining | MethodImplOptions.NoOptimization)]Di2015NewLinepublic static bool ConstantCompare(byte[] array1, byte[] array2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const byte Zero = 0;Di2015NewLine    int maxLength = array1.Length > array2.Length ? array1.Length : array2.Length;Di2015NewLine    bool wereEqual = array1.Length == array2.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] paddedArray1 = new byte[maxLength];Di2015NewLine    byte[] paddedArray2 = new byte[maxLength];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < maxLength; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        paddedArray1[i] = array1.Length > i ? array1[i] : Zero;Di2015NewLine        paddedArray2[i] = array2.Length > i ? array2[i] : Zero;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    bool compareResult = true;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < maxLength; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        compareResult = compareResult & paddedArray1[i] == paddedArray2[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return compareResult & wereEqual;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6344171Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool Is64BitProcessDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    get { return IntPtr.Size == 8; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static bool Is64BitOperatingSystemDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    getDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Clearly if this is a 64-bit process we must be on a 64-bit OS.Di2015NewLine        if (Is64BitProcess)Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        // Ok, so we are a 32-bit process, but is the OS 64-bit?Di2015NewLine        // If we are running under Wow64 than the OS is 64-bit.Di2015NewLine        bool isWow64;Di2015NewLine        return ModuleContainsFunction("kernel32.dll", "IsWow64Process") && IsWow64Process(GetCurrentProcess(), out isWow64) && isWow64;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic bool ModuleContainsFunction(string moduleName, string methodName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IntPtr hModule = GetModuleHandle(moduleName);Di2015NewLine    if (hModule != IntPtr.Zero)Di2015NewLine        return GetProcAddress(hModule, methodName) != IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError=true)]Di2015NewLine[return:MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.Bool)]Di2015NewLineextern static bool IsWow64Process(IntPtr hProcess, [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.Bool)] out bool isWow64);Di2015NewLine[DllImport("kernel32.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Auto, SetLastError=true)]Di2015NewLineextern static IntPtr GetCurrentProcess();Di2015NewLine[DllImport("kernel32.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Auto)]Di2015NewLineextern static IntPtr GetModuleHandle(string moduleName);Di2015NewLine[DllImport("kernel32.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Ansi, SetLastError=true)]Di2015NewLineextern static IntPtr GetProcAddress(IntPtr hModule, string methodName);Di2015NewLine

= sourceType.ToString();Di2015NewLine    String DBType = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine    int keyCount = DBTypeConversionKey.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for(int i=0;i<keyCount;i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    if(DBTypeConversionKey[i,1].Equals(SystemType)) DBType = DBTypeConversionKey[i,0];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Type DbTypeToSystemType( SqlDbType sourceType )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    Type result;Di2015NewLine    String SystemType = 6346928Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class StackOverflow_6346646Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void SerializeGuid()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Serializing Guid[]");Di2015NewLine        var guids = new Guid[20000];Di2015NewLine        Random rndGen = new Random();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < guids.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            guids[i] = Guid.NewGuid();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        Stopwatch watch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine        DataContractSerializer dcs = new DataContractSerializer(guids.GetType());Di2015NewLine        XmlDictionaryWriter binaryWriter = XmlDictionaryWriter.CreateBinaryWriter(ms);Di2015NewLine        watch.Start();Di2015NewLine        dcs.WriteObject(binaryWriter, guids);Di2015NewLine        binaryWriter.Flush();Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Serialized in {0}ms, total size = {1} bytes", watch.ElapsedMilliseconds, ms.Position);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static void SerializeInt()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Serializing int[]");Di2015NewLine        var guids = new int[80000]; // new Guid[20000];Di2015NewLine        Random rndGen = new Random();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < guids.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            guids[i] = rndGen.Next(); // Guid.NewGuid();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        Stopwatch watch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine        DataContractSerializer dcs = new DataContractSerializer(guids.GetType());Di2015NewLine        XmlDictionaryWriter binaryWriter = XmlDictionaryWriter.CreateBinaryWriter(ms);Di2015NewLine        watch.Start();Di2015NewLine        dcs.WriteObject(binaryWriter, guids);Di2015NewLine        binaryWriter.Flush();Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Serialized in {0}ms, total size = {1} bytes", watch.ElapsedMilliseconds, ms.Position);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static void SerializeGuidAsByteArray(bool useLinq)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Serializing Guid[] as byte[], {0}", useLinq ? "using LINQ" : "not using LINQ");Di2015NewLine        var guids = new Guid[20000];Di2015NewLine        Random rndGen = new Random();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < guids.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            guids[i] = Guid.NewGuid();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        Stopwatch watch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine        DataContractSerializer dcs = new DataContractSerializer(typeof(byte[]));Di2015NewLine        XmlDictionaryWriter binaryWriter = XmlDictionaryWriter.CreateBinaryWriter(ms);Di2015NewLine        watch.Start();Di2015NewLine        byte[] bytes;Di2015NewLine        if (useLinq)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bytes = guids.SelectMany(x => x.ToByteArray()).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bytes = new byte[guids.Length * 16];Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < guids.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte[] guidBytes = guids[i].ToByteArray();Di2015NewLine                Buffer.BlockCopy(guidBytes, 0, bytes, 16 * i, 16);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        dcs.WriteObject(binaryWriter, bytes);Di2015NewLine        binaryWriter.Flush();Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Serialized in {0}ms, total size = {1} bytes", watch.ElapsedMilliseconds, ms.Position);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static void Test()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SerializeGuid();Di2015NewLine        SerializeInt();Di2015NewLine        SerializeGuidAsByteArray(true);Di2015NewLine        SerializeGuidAsByteArray(false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6349733Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Append(Stream source, Stream target)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BinaryWriter writer = new BinaryWriter(target);Di2015NewLine        BinaryReader reader = new BinaryReader(source);  Di2015NewLine        writer.Write((long)source.Length);Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLine        int read;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            read = reader.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            writer.Write(buffer, 0, read);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (read > 0);Di2015NewLine        writer.Flush();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Stream ReadNextStream(Stream packed)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BinaryReader reader = new BinaryReader(packed);Di2015NewLine        int streamLength = (int)reader.ReadInt64();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MemoryStream result = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[streamLength];Di2015NewLine        reader.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        BinaryWriter writer = new BinaryWriter(result);Di2015NewLine        writer.Write(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        writer.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        result.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6350647Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> names = new List<string>() { "Jeff", "John", "Joe", "Jack", "Jim" };Di2015NewLine        List<string> otherNames = new List<string>() { "Jeff", "John", "Joe", "Jack", "Jim" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Random r = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 4; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int pick1 = r.Next(i);Di2015NewLine            int pick2 = r.Next(i);Di2015NewLine            while (names[pick1] == otherNames[pick2])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                pick2++;Di2015NewLine                if (pick2 >= otherNames.Count) pick2 = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (names.Count == 2)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // when you only have 2 names left, if the other names match...Di2015NewLine                if (names[1 - pick1] == otherNames[1 - pick2])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // swap one of the picked namesDi2015NewLine                    pick2 = 1 - pick2;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(names[pick1]); Console.Write(" != "); Console.WriteLine(otherNames[pick2]);Di2015NewLine            names.RemoveAt(pick1);Di2015NewLine            otherNames.RemoveAt(pick2);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6355213Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Copy an object to destination object, only matching fields will be copiedDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T"></typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sourceObject">An object with matching fields of the destination object</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="destObject">Destination object, must already be created</param>Di2015NewLine    public static void ShallowCopyTo<T>(this object sourceObject, ref T destObject)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Copy<T>(sourceObject,ref destObject);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Copy an object to destination object, only matching fields will be copiedDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T"></typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sourceObject">An object with matching fields of the destination object</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="destObject">Destination object, must already be created</param>Di2015NewLine    public static void Copy<T>(object sourceObject, ref T destObject)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //  If either the source, or destination is null, returnDi2015NewLine        if (sourceObject == null || destObject == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //  Get the type of each objectDi2015NewLine        Type sourceType = sourceObject.GetType();Di2015NewLine        Type targetType = destObject.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //  Loop through the source propertiesDi2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo p in sourceType.GetProperties())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //  Get the matching property in the destination objectDi2015NewLine            PropertyInfo targetObj = targetType.GetProperty(p.Name);Di2015NewLine            //  If there is none, skipDi2015NewLine            if (targetObj == null)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //  Set the value in the destinationDi2015NewLine            targetObj.SetValue(destObject, p.GetValue(sourceObject, null), null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
6355213Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Reference Article http://www.codeproject.com/KB/tips/SerializedObjectCloner.aspxDi2015NewLine/// Di2015NewLine/// Provides a method for performing a deep copy of an object.Di2015NewLine/// Binary Serialization is used to perform the copy.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class ObjectCopierDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Perform a deep Copy of the object.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">The type of object being copied.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="source">The object instance to copy.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The copied object.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static T Clone<T>(this T source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!typeof(T).IsSerializable)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("The type must be serializable.", "source");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Don't serialize a null object, simply return the default for that objectDi2015NewLine        if (Object.ReferenceEquals(source, null))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return default(T);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IFormatter formatter = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine        Stream stream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        using (stream)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            formatter.Serialize(stream, source);Di2015NewLine            stream.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine            return (T)formatter.Deserialize(stream);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6355690Di2015UniqueSeparator// ----------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLinepublic void TimePeriodMapperSample()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  TimeCalendar timeCalendar = new TimeCalendar();Di2015NewLine  CultureInfo ci = CultureInfo.InvariantCulture;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  DateTime start = new DateTime( 2011, 3, 1, 13, 0, 0 );Di2015NewLine  DateTime end = new DateTime( 2011, 3, 1, 14, 0, 0 );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine( "Original start: {0}",Di2015NewLine                     start.ToString( "HH:mm:ss.fffffff", ci ) );Di2015NewLine  // > Original start: 13:00:00.0000000Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine( "Original end: {0}",Di2015NewLine                     end.ToString( "HH:mm:ss.fffffff", ci ) );Di2015NewLine  // > Original end: 14:00:00.0000000Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine( "Mapping offset start: {0}", timeCalendar.StartOffset );Di2015NewLine  // > Mapping offset start: 00:00:00Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine( "Mapping offset end: {0}", timeCalendar.EndOffset );Di2015NewLine  // > Mapping offset end: -00:00:00.0000001Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine( "Mapped start: {0}",Di2015NewLine    timeCalendar.MapStart( start ).ToString( "HH:mm:ss.fffffff", ci ) );Di2015NewLine  // > Mapped start: 13:00:00.0000000Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine( "Mapped end: {0}",Di2015NewLine    timeCalendar.MapEnd( end ).ToString( "HH:mm:ss.fffffff", ci ) );Di2015NewLine  // > Mapped end: 13:59:59.9999999Di2015NewLine} // TimePeriodMapperSampleDi2015NewLine

6356377Di2015UniqueSeparatorBgwb+g==Di2015NewLineURm6crE=Di2015NewLinezsDtMmQ=Di2015NewLine
6356377Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        long x = 000101456890L, y = 348324000433L, z = 888000033380L;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Convert.ToString(x, 16));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Convert.ToString(y, 16));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Convert.ToString(y, 16));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Pack(x));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Pack(y));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Pack(z));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Convert.ToInt64("60c1bfa", 16).ToString().PadLeft(12, '0'));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Convert.ToInt64("5119ba72b1", 16).ToString().PadLeft(12, '0'));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Convert.ToInt64("cec0ed3264", 16).ToString().PadLeft(12, '0'));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Unpack("Bgwb+g==").ToString().PadLeft(12, '0'));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Unpack("URm6crE=").ToString().PadLeft(12, '0'));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Unpack("zsDtMmQ=").ToString().PadLeft(12, '0'));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static string Pack(long value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ulong a = (ulong)value; // make shift easyDi2015NewLine        List<byte> bytes = new List<byte>(8);Di2015NewLine        while (a != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bytes.Add((byte)a);Di2015NewLine            a >>= 8;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        bytes.Reverse();Di2015NewLine        var chunk = bytes.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        return Convert.ToBase64String(chunk);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static long Unpack(string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var chunk = Convert.FromBase64String(value);Di2015NewLine        ulong a = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < chunk.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            a <<= 8;Di2015NewLine            a |= chunk[i];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return (long)a;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6360441Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CustomDateTimeConverter : IValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, Di2015NewLine                          CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value == null) { return ""; }Di2015NewLine        DateTime dt;Di2015NewLine        if (DateTime.TryParse(value.ToString(), CultureInfo.CurrentCulture, Di2015NewLine                              DateTimeStyles.None, out dt))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return dt.ToShortDateString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return "";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object ConvertBack(object value, Type targettype, object parameter, Di2015NewLine                              CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value == null || value.ToString().Trim().Length==0) { return null; }Di2015NewLine        string frmt = CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.DateTimeFormat.ShortDatePattern;Di2015NewLine        DateTime dt;Di2015NewLine        if (DateTime.TryParseExact(value.ToString(), frmt, Di2015NewLine                                   CultureInfo.CurrentCulture, Di2015NewLine                                   DateTimeStyles.None, out dt))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return dt;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return DependencyProperty.UnsetValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6363491Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [Flags]Di2015NewLine    enum MoveFileFlagsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        None = 0,Di2015NewLine        ReplaceExisting = 1,Di2015NewLine        CopyAllowed = 2,Di2015NewLine        DelayUntilReboot = 4,Di2015NewLine        WriteThrough = 8,Di2015NewLine        CreateHardlink = 16,Di2015NewLine        FailIfNotTrackable = 32,Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("kernel32.dll", SetLastError = true, CharSet = CharSet.Unicode)]Di2015NewLine    static extern bool MoveFileEx(Di2015NewLine        string lpExistingFileName,Di2015NewLine        string lpNewFileName,Di2015NewLine        MoveFileFlags dwFlagsDi2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string lockFile = "foo.dat";Di2015NewLine        if (!File.Exists(lockFile))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // that's a first run after the reboot => create the fileDi2015NewLine            File.WriteAllText(lockFile, "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Mark the file for deletion after rebootDi2015NewLine            MoveFileEx(lockFile, null, MoveFileFlags.DelayUntilReboot);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("it's a first run");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // that's a consecutive runDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("it's a consecutive run");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6366832Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Encoding GetFileEncoding(string srcFile)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine // *** Use Default of Encoding.Default (Ansi CodePage)Di2015NewLine            Encoding encoding = Encoding.Default;Di2015NewLine            using (FileStream stream = File.OpenRead(fileName))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // *** Detect byte order mark if any - otherwise assume defaultDi2015NewLine                byte[] buff = new byte[5];Di2015NewLine                stream.Read(buff, 0, buff.Length);Di2015NewLine                if (buff[0] == 0xEF && buff[1] == 0xBB && buff[2] == 0xBF)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    encoding = Encoding.UTF8;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (buff[0] == 0xFE && buff[1] == 0xFF)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    encoding = Encoding.BigEndianUnicode;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (buff[0] == 0xFF && buff[1] == 0xFE)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    encoding = Encoding.Unicode;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (buff[0] == 0 && buff[1] == 0 && buff[2] == 0xFE && buff[3] == 0xFF)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    encoding = Encoding.UTF32;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else if (buff[0] == 0x2B && buff[1] == 0x2F && buff[2] == 0x76)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    encoding = Encoding.UTF7;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return encoding;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6371958Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ComparerExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IComparer<T> ThenBy<T>(this IComparer<T> comparer1,Di2015NewLine                                         IComparer<T> comparer2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new ChainedComparer<T>(comparer1, comparer2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class ChainedComparer<T> : IComparer<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly IComparer<T> comparer1;Di2015NewLine        private readonly IComparer<T> comparer2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ChainedComparer(IComparer<T> comparer1,Di2015NewLine                               IComparer<T> comparer2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.comparer1 = comparer1;Di2015NewLine            this.comparer2 = comparer2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int Compare(T x, T y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int result = this.comparer1.Compare(x, y);Di2015NewLine            if (result == 0) result = this.comparer2.Compare(x, y);Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6371958Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ChainComparer<T> : IComparer<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly IEnumerable<IComparer<T>> comparers;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ChainComparer(params IComparer<T>[] comparers)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.comparers = comparers;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Compare(T x, T y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int result = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var comparer in this.comparers)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result = comparer.Compare(x, y);Di2015NewLine            if (result != 0) break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6372610Di2015UniqueSeparatorWhen creating instances of POCO entity types, the Entity Framework often creates instances of a dynamically generated derived type that acts as a proxy for the entity. This proxy overrides some virtual properties of the entity to insert hooks for performing actions automatically when the property is accessed.
6372610Di2015UniqueSeparatorSometimes disabling proxy creation is useful to prevent the Entity Framework from creating proxy instances. For example, serializing non-proxy instances is considerably easier than serializing proxy instances. Proxy creation can be turned off by clearing the ProxyCreationEnabled flag.

6378314Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T GetConfigEnumValue<T>(NameValueCollection config, string configKey, T defaultValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (config == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return defaultValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (config[configKey] == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return defaultValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    T result = defaultValue;Di2015NewLine    string configValue = config[configKey].Trim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(configValue))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return defaultValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result = (T)Enum.Parse(typeof(T), configValue, true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catchDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result = defaultValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6381510Di2015UniqueSeparator<%@ WebHandler Language="C#" Class="Handler" %>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Web;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing.Drawing2D;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing.Imaging;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Handler : IHttpHandler {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ProcessRequest (HttpContext context) {Di2015NewLine        context.Response.ContentType = "image/jpeg";Di2015NewLine        int x = int.Parse(context.Request["x"]);Di2015NewLine        int y = int.Parse(context.Request["y"]);Di2015NewLine        int h = int.Parse(context.Request["h"]);Di2015NewLine        int w = int.Parse(context.Request["w"]);Di2015NewLine        int scalew = int.Parse(context.Request["scalew"]);Di2015NewLine        int scaleh = int.Parse(context.Request["scaleh"]);Di2015NewLine        using (Image img = CustomCrop(w, h, x, y, scalew, scaleh))Di2015NewLine            img.Save(context.Response.OutputStream,ImageFormat.Jpeg); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Image CustomCrop(int width, int height, int x, int y, int scalwidth, int scalheight)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Image image = Image.FromFile("c:\\\\x.jpg");Di2015NewLine            Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(scalwidth, scalheight, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLine            bmp.SetResolution(80, 60);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Graphics gfx = Graphics.FromImage(bmp);Di2015NewLine            gfx.SmoothingMode = SmoothingMode.AntiAlias;Di2015NewLine            gfx.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.HighQualityBicubic;Di2015NewLine            gfx.PixelOffsetMode = PixelOffsetMode.HighQuality;Di2015NewLine            gfx.DrawImage(image, new Rectangle(0, 0, scalwidth, scalheight), x, y, width, height, GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return bmp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public bool IsReusable {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6386144Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO.Packaging;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ZipSampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AddFileToZip("Output.zip", @"C:\\Windows\\Notepad.exe");Di2015NewLine            AddFileToZip("Output.zip", @"C:\\Windows\\System32\\Calc.exe");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private const long BUFFER_SIZE = 4096;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void AddFileToZip(string zipFilename, string fileToAdd)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (Package zip = System.IO.Packaging.Package.Open(zipFilename, FileMode.OpenOrCreate))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string destFilename = ".\\\\" + Path.GetFileName(fileToAdd);Di2015NewLine                Uri uri = PackUriHelper.CreatePartUri(new Uri(destFilename, UriKind.Relative));Di2015NewLine                if (zip.PartExists(uri))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    zip.DeletePart(uri);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                PackagePart part = zip.CreatePart(uri, "",CompressionOption.Normal);Di2015NewLine                using (FileStream fileStream = new FileStream(fileToAdd, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    using (Stream dest = part.GetStream())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        CopyStream(fileStream, dest);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void CopyStream(System.IO.FileStream inputStream, System.IO.Stream outputStream)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            long bufferSize = inputStream.Length < BUFFER_SIZE ? inputStream.Length : BUFFER_SIZE;Di2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = new byte[bufferSize];Di2015NewLine            int bytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLine            long bytesWritten = 0;Di2015NewLine            while ((bytesRead = inputStream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                outputStream.Write(buffer, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLine                bytesWritten += bufferSize;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6387934Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void RunOracleTransaction(string myConnString)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   OracleConnection myConnection = new OracleConnection(myConnString);Di2015NewLine   myConnection.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   OracleCommand myCommand = myConnection.CreateCommand();Di2015NewLine   OracleTransaction myTrans;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // Start a local transactionDi2015NewLine   myTrans = myConnection.BeginTransaction(IsolationLevel.ReadCommitted);Di2015NewLine   // Assign transaction object for a pending local transactionDi2015NewLine   myCommand.Transaction = myTrans;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   tryDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine myCommand.CommandText = "INSERT INTO Dept (DeptNo, Dname, Loc) values (50,     'TECHNOLOGY', 'DENVER')";Di2015NewLine     myCommand.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine myCommand.CommandText = "INSERT INTO Dept (DeptNo, Dname, Loc) values (60,     'ENGINEERING', 'KANSAS CITY')";Di2015NewLine     myCommand.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine     myTrans.Commit();Di2015NewLine     Console.WriteLine("Both records are written to database.");Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   catch(Exception e)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine     myTrans.Rollback();Di2015NewLine     Console.WriteLine(e.ToString());Di2015NewLine     Console.WriteLine("Neither record was written to database.");Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   finallyDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine     myConnection.Close();Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6388294Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic override bool TryGetMember(GetMemberBinder binder, out object result)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var name = binder.Name; Di2015NewLine            //Code to check if key is of form __numeric__<number> so that numeric keys can be accessedDi2015NewLine            if (binder != null && binder.Name != null && binder.Name.StartsWith("__numeric__"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                name = binder.Name.Substring(11);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!_dictionary.TryGetValue(name, out result))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // return null to avoid exception.  caller can check for null this way...Di2015NewLine                result = null;Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var dictionary = result as IDictionary<string, object>;Di2015NewLine            if (dictionary != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result = new DynamicJsonObject(dictionary);Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var arrayList = result as ArrayList;Di2015NewLine            if (arrayList != null && arrayList.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (arrayList[0] is IDictionary<string, object>)Di2015NewLine                    result = new List<object>(arrayList.Cast<IDictionary<string, object>>().Select(x => new DynamicJsonObject(x)));Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    result = new List<object>(arrayList.Cast<object>());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

6389323Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyAsyncHandler : IHttpAsyncHandlerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public IAsyncResult BeginProcessRequest(HttpContext context, AsyncCallback cb, object extraData)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // NOTE: the result of this operation is void, but TCS requires some data type so we just use boolDi2015NewLine        TaskCompletionSource<bool> webClientDownloadCompletionSource = new TaskCompletionSource<bool>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WebClient webClient = new WebClient())Di2015NewLine        HttpContext currentHttpContext = HttpContext.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Setup the download completed event handlerDi2015NewLine        client.DownloadDataCompleted += (o, e) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(e.Cancelled)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // If it was canceled, signal the TCS is cacnceledDi2015NewLine                // NOTE: probably don't need this since you have nothing canceling the operation anywayDi2015NewLine                webClientDownloadCompletionSource.SetCanceled();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if(e.Error != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // If there was an exception, signal the TCS with the exceptionDi2015NewLine                webClientDownloadCompletionSource.SetException(e.Error);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Success, write the responseDi2015NewLine                currentHttpContext.Response.ContentType = "text/xml";Di2015NewLine                currentHttpContext.Response.OutputStream.Write(e.Result, 0, e.Result.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Signal the TCS that were done (we don't actually look at the bool result, but it's needed)Di2015NewLine                taskCompletionSource.SetResult(true);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string url = "url_web_service_url";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Kick off the download immediatelyDi2015NewLine        client.DownloadDataAsync(new Uri(url));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the TCS's task so that we can append some continuationsDi2015NewLine        Task webClientDownloadTask = webClientDownloadCompletionSource.Task;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Always dispose of the client once the work is completedDi2015NewLine        webClientDownloadTask.ContinueWith(Di2015NewLine            _ =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                client.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            },Di2015NewLine            TaskContinuationOptions.ExecuteSynchronously);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If there was a callback passed in, we need to invoke it after the download work has completedDi2015NewLine        if(cb != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            webClientDownloadTask.ContinueWith(Di2015NewLine               webClientDownloadAntecedent =>Di2015NewLine               {Di2015NewLine                   cb(webClientDownloadAntecedent);Di2015NewLine               },Di2015NewLine               TaskContinuationOptions.ExecuteSynchronously);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return the TCS's Task as the IAsyncResultDi2015NewLine        return webClientDownloadTask;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void EndProcessRequest(IAsyncResult result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Unwrap the task and wait on it which will propagate any exceptions that might have occurredDi2015NewLine        ((Task)result).Wait();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsReusableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            return true; // why not return true here? you have no state, it's easily reusable!Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ProcessRequest(HttpContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

        }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6402229Di2015UniqueSeparator    static decimal[,] Rotate(decimal[,] input, int k)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int m = input.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLine        int n = input.GetLength(1);Di2015NewLine        decimal[,] result = new decimal[m, n];Di2015NewLine        for (int i=0; i<m; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int p = (i + k) % m;Di2015NewLine            if (p < 0)Di2015NewLine                p += m;Di2015NewLine            for (int j=0; j<n; j++)Di2015NewLine                result[p, j] = input[i, j];Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
