6405912Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ViewMailer : IViewMailerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region IViewMailer MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string RenderPartialViewToString(string viewName, object model, ControllerContext controllerContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(viewName))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            viewName = controllerContext.RouteData.GetRequiredString("action");Di2015NewLine        controllerContext.Controller.ViewData.Model = model;Di2015NewLine        using (var stringWriter = new StringWriter())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ViewEngineResult viewEngineResult = ViewEngines.Engines.FindPartialView(controllerContext, viewName);Di2015NewLine            var viewContext = new ViewContext(controllerContext, viewEngineResult.View,Di2015NewLine                                              controllerContext.Controller.ViewData,Di2015NewLine                                              controllerContext.Controller.TempData, stringWriter);Di2015NewLine            viewEngineResult.View.Render(viewContext, stringWriter);Di2015NewLine            return stringWriter.GetStringBuilder().ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6405929Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DefaultValueHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void InitializeDefaultValues<T>(T obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var properties =Di2015NewLine            (from prop in obj.GetType().GetProperties()Di2015NewLine             let attr = GetDefaultValueAttribute(prop)Di2015NewLine             where attr != nullDi2015NewLine             select newDi2015NewLine             {Di2015NewLine                Property = prop,Di2015NewLine                DefaultValue = attr.ValueDi2015NewLine             }).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var p in properties)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            p.Property.SetValue(obj, p.DefaultValue, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static DefaultValueAttribute GetDefaultValueAttribute(PropertyInfo prop)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return prop.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(DefaultValueAttribute), true)Di2015NewLine                   .Cast<DefaultValueAttribute>()Di2015NewLine                   .FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6405929Di2015UniqueSeparatorInitializeDefaultValues
6405929Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Foo()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DefaultValueHelper.InitializeDefaultValues(this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DefaultValue("(no name)")]Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6405929Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class DefaultValueHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly Dictionary<Type, Action<object>> _initializerCache;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static DefaultValueHelper()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _initializerCache = new Dictionary<Type, Action<object>>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void InitializeDefaultValues(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (obj == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var type = obj.GetType();Di2015NewLine        Action<object> initializer;Di2015NewLine        if (!_initializerCache.TryGetValue(type, out initializer))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            initializer = MakeInitializer(type);Di2015NewLine            _initializerCache[type] = initializer;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        initializer(obj);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Action<object> MakeInitializer(Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var arg = Expression.Parameter(typeof(object), "arg");Di2015NewLine        var variable = Expression.Variable(type, "x");Di2015NewLine        var cast = Expression.Assign(variable, Expression.Convert(arg, type));Di2015NewLine        var assignments =Di2015NewLine            from prop in type.GetProperties()Di2015NewLine            let attr = GetDefaultValueAttribute(prop)Di2015NewLine            where attr != nullDi2015NewLine            select Expression.Assign(Expression.Property(variable, prop), Expression.Constant(attr.Value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var body = Expression.Block(Di2015NewLine            new ParameterExpression[] { variable },Di2015NewLine            new Expression[] { cast }.Concat(assignments));Di2015NewLine        var expr = Expression.Lambda<Action<object>>(body, arg);Di2015NewLine        return expr.Compile();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static DefaultValueAttribute GetDefaultValueAttribute(PropertyInfo prop)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return prop.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(DefaultValueAttribute), true)Di2015NewLine                   .Cast<DefaultValueAttribute>()Di2015NewLine                   .FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine 6412491Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static System.Web.UI.Control GetPostBackControl(System.Web.UI.Page page)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Control control = null;Di2015NewLine    string ctrlname = page.Request.Params["__EVENTTARGET"];Di2015NewLine    if (ctrlname != null && ctrlname != String.Empty)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        control = page.FindControl(ctrlname);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // if __EVENTTARGET is null, the control is a button type and we need to Di2015NewLine    // iterate over the form collection to find itDi2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string ctrlStr = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine        Control c = null;Di2015NewLine        foreach (string ctl in page.Request.Form)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // handle ImageButton controls ...Di2015NewLine            if (ctl.EndsWith(".x") || ctl.EndsWith(".y"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ctrlStr = ctl.Substring(0, ctl.Length - 2);Di2015NewLine                c = page.FindControl(ctrlStr);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                c = page.FindControl(ctl);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (c is System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button ||Di2015NewLine                        c is System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                control = c;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return control;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6413841Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Utility methods for enum values. This static type will fail to initialize Di2015NewLine/// (throwing a <see cref="TypeInitializationException"/>) ifDi2015NewLine/// you try to provide a value that is not an enum.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="T">An enum type. </typeparam>Di2015NewLinepublic static class EnumUtil<T>Di2015NewLine    where T : struct, IConvertible // Try to get as much of a static check as we can.Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The .NET framework doesn't provide a compile-checkedDi2015NewLine    // way to ensure that a type is an enum, so we have to check when the typeDi2015NewLine    // is statically invoked.Di2015NewLine    static EnumUtil()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Throw Exception on static initialization if the given type isn't an enum.Di2015NewLine        Require.That(typeof (T).IsEnum, () => typeof(T).FullName + " is not an enum type.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// In the .NET Framework, objects can be cast to enum values which are notDi2015NewLine    /// defined for their type. This method provides a simple fail-fast checkDi2015NewLine    /// that the enum value is defined, and creates a cast at the same time.Di2015NewLine    /// Cast the given value as the given enum type.Di2015NewLine    /// Throw an exception if the value is not defined for the given enum type.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T"></typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="enumValue"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <exception cref="InvalidCastException">Di2015NewLine    /// If the given value is not a defined value of the enum type.Di2015NewLine    /// </exception>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static T DefinedCast(object enumValue)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!System.Enum.IsDefined(typeof(T), enumValue))Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidCastException(enumValue + " is not a defined value for enum type " +Di2015NewLine                                           typeof (T).FullName);Di2015NewLine        return (T) enumValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="enumValue"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static T Parse(string enumValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var parsedValue = (T)System.Enum.Parse(typeof (T), enumValue);Di2015NewLine        //Require that the parsed value is definedDi2015NewLine        Require.That(parsedValue.IsDefined(), Di2015NewLine            () => new ArgumentException(string.Format("{0} is not a defined value for enum type {1}", Di2015NewLine                enumValue, typeof(T).FullName)));Di2015NewLine        return parsedValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool IsDefined(T enumValue)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return System.Enum.IsDefined(typeof (T), enumValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6416341Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TrieDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public class NodeDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    public string Word;Di2015NewLine    public bool IsTerminal { get { return Word != null; } }Di2015NewLine    public Dictionary<Letter, Node> Edges = new Dictionary<Letter, Node>();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public Node Root = new Node();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public Trie(string[] words)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    for (int w = 0; w < words.Length; w++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var word = words[w];Di2015NewLine      var node = Root;Di2015NewLine      for (int len = 1; len <= word.Length; len++)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        var letter = word[len - 1];Di2015NewLine        Node next;Di2015NewLine        if (!node.Edges.TryGetValue(letter, out next))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          next = new Node();Di2015NewLine          if (len == word.Length)Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            next.Word = word;Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine          node.Edges.Add(letter, next);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        node = next;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

6416581Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Split<T>Di2015NewLine    (IEnumerable<T> source, ICollection<T> delimiter)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // window represents the last [delimeter length] elements in the sequence,Di2015NewLine    // buffer is the elements waiting to be output when delimiter is hitDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var window = new Queue<T>();Di2015NewLine    var buffer = new List<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (T element in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        buffer.Add(element);Di2015NewLine        window.Enqueue(element);Di2015NewLine        if (window.Count > delimiter.Count)Di2015NewLine            window.Dequeue();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (window.SequenceEqual(delimiter))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // number of non-delimiter elements in the bufferDi2015NewLine            int nElements = buffer.Count - window.Count;Di2015NewLine            if (nElements > 0)Di2015NewLine                yield return buffer.Take(nElements).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            window.Clear();Di2015NewLine            buffer.Clear();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (buffer.Any())Di2015NewLine        yield return buffer;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6419553Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace q6359774Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class MyRichTextBox : RichTextBoxDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const int EM_SETWORDBREAKPROC = 0x00D0;Di2015NewLine        const int EM_GETWORDBREAKPROC = 0x00D1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void OnHandleCreated(EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            base.OnHandleCreated(e);Di2015NewLine            this.Text = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz-abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";Di2015NewLine            NewMethod();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        unsafe private void NewMethod()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!this.DesignMode)Di2015NewLine                SendMessage(this.Handle, EM_SETWORDBREAKPROC, IntPtr.Zero, Marshal.GetFunctionPointerForDelegate(new EditWordBreakProc(MyEditWordBreakProc)));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("User32.DLL")]Di2015NewLine        public static extern IntPtr SendMessage(IntPtr hWnd, UInt32 Msg, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        unsafe delegate int EditWordBreakProc(char* lpch, int ichCurrent, int cch, int code);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        unsafe int MyEditWordBreakProc(char* lpch, int ichCurrent, int cch, int code)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            const int WB_ISDELIMITER = 2;Di2015NewLine            const int WB_CLASSIFY = 3;Di2015NewLine            if (code == WB_ISDELIMITER)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                char ch = *lpch;Di2015NewLine                return ch == '-' ? 0 : 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (code == WB_CLASSIFY)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                char ch = *lpch;Di2015NewLine                var vResult = Char.GetUnicodeCategory(ch);Di2015NewLine                return (int)vResult;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var lpch2 = lpch;Di2015NewLine                // in this case, we must find the begining of a word:Di2015NewLine                for (int it = ichCurrent; it < cch; it++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    char ch = *lpch2;Di2015NewLine                    if (it + 1 < cch && lpch2[0] == '-' && lpch2[1] != '-')Di2015NewLine                        return it;Di2015NewLine                    if (lpch2[0] == '\\0')Di2015NewLine                        return 0;Di2015NewLine                    lpch2++;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6419553Di2015UniqueSeparatorEM_SETWORDBREAKPROC
6419553Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace q6359774Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class MyRichTextBox : RichTextBoxDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const int EM_SETWORDBREAKPROC = 0x00D0;Di2015NewLine        const int EM_GETWORDBREAKPROC = 0x00D1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override void OnHandleCreated(EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            base.OnHandleCreated(e);Di2015NewLine            this.Text = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz-abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";Di2015NewLine            if (!this.DesignMode)Di2015NewLine                SendMessage(this.Handle, EM_SETWORDBREAKPROC, IntPtr.Zero, Marshal.GetFunctionPointerForDelegate(new EditWordBreakProc(MyEditWordBreakProc)));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("User32.DLL")]Di2015NewLine        public static extern IntPtr SendMessage(IntPtr hWnd, UInt32 Msg, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        delegate int EditWordBreakProc(string lpch, int ichCurrent, int cch, int code);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int MyEditWordBreakProc(string lpch, int ichCurrent, int cch, int code)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            const int WB_ISDELIMITER = 2;Di2015NewLine            const int WB_CLASSIFY = 3;Di2015NewLine            if (code == WB_ISDELIMITER)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (lpch.Length == 0 || lpch == null) return 0;Di2015NewLine                char ch = lpch[ichCurrent];Di2015NewLine                return ch == '-' ? 0 : 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (code == WB_CLASSIFY)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (lpch.Length == 0 || lpch == null) return 0;Di2015NewLine                char ch = lpch[ichCurrent];Di2015NewLine                var vResult = Char.GetUnicodeCategory(ch);Di2015NewLine                return (int)vResult;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (lpch.Length == 0 || lpch == null) return 0;Di2015NewLine                for (int it = ichCurrent; it < lpch.Length; it++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    char ch = lpch[it];Di2015NewLine                    if (ch != '-') return it;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

typeof(float),Di2015NewLine            typeof(double),Di2015NewLine            typeof(decimal),Di2015NewLine            typeof(DateTime),Di2015NewLine        }.Contains(t);Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static IntPtr CreateSignerSubjectInfo(string pathToAssembly)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var info = new SIGNER_SUBJECT_INFODi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                cbSize = (uint)Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(SIGNER_SUBJECT_INFO)),Di2015NewLine                pdwIndex = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(uint)))Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            var index = 0;Di2015NewLine            Marshal.StructureToPtr(index, info.pdwIndex, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            info.dwSubjectChoice = 0x1; pSubjectInfo, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return pSubjectInfo;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static X509Certificate FindCertByThumbnail(string thumbnail)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var store = new X509Store(StoreName.TrustedPublisher, StoreLocation.LocalMachine);Di2015NewLine                store.Open(OpenFlags.ReadOnly);Di2015NewLine                var certs = store.Certificates.Find(X509FindType.FindByThumbprint, thumbnail, false);Di2015NewLine                if (certs.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception(string.Format("Unable to find certificate with thumbnail '{0}'", thumbnail));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (certs.Count > 1) // Can this happen?Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception(string.Format("More than one certificate with thumbnail '{0}'", thumbnail));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                store.Close();Di2015NewLine                return certs[0];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception(string.Format("Error locating certificate", e));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static IntPtr CreateSignerCert(string thumbNail)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var           Union1 = new SIGNER_CERT.SignerCertUnionDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    pCertStoreInfo =           const int X509_ASN_ENCODING = 0x00000001;Di2015NewLine            const int PKCS_7_ASN_ENCODING = 0x00010000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var cert = FindCertByThumbnail(thumbNail);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var pCertContext = CertCreateCertificateContext(Di2015NewLine                X509_ASN_ENCODING | PKCS_7_ASN_ENCODING,Di2015NewLine                cert.GetRawCertData(),Di2015NewLine                cert.GetRawCertData().Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var certStoreInfo = new SIGNER_CERT_STORE_INFODi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                cbSize = (uint)Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(SIGNER_CERT_STORE_INFO)),Di2015NewLine                pSigningCert = pCertContext,Di2015NewLine                dwCertPolicy = 0x2, // SIGNER_CERT_POLICY_CHAINDi2015NewLine                hCertStore = IntPtr.ZeroDi2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Marshal.StructureToPtr(certStoreInfo,            pAttrAuthCode = IntPtr.Zero,Di2015NewLine                psAuthenticated = IntPtr.Zero,Di2015NewLine                psUnauthenticated = IntPtr.ZeroDi2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            IntPtr pSignatureInfo = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(Marshal.SizeOf(signatureInfo));Di2015NewLine            Marshal.StructureToPtr(signatureInfo, pSignatureInfo, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return pSignatureInfo;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void TimeStampSignedCode(IntPtr pSubjectInfo, string tsaServer)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var hResult = SignerTimeStamp(Di2015NewLine                pSubjectInfo,Di2015NewLine                tsaServer,Di2015NewLine                IntPtr.Zero,Di2015NewLine 6430325Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TextTranstition transition = new TextTranstition();Di2015NewLine        transition.TransitionFinished += TransitionTicked;Di2015NewLine        transition.TransitionTicked += TransitionTicked;Di2015NewLine        transition.StartTransition("AmazingWordTransition", "MyNewWordAppearing", 100);Di2015NewLine        Thread.CurrentThread.Join();Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void TransitionTicked(object sender, TranstitionEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.Clear();Di2015NewLine        Console.Write(e.TransitionText);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class TranstitionEventArgs : EventArgsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly string transitionText;Di2015NewLine    public string TransitionText { get { return this.transitionText; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TranstitionEventArgs(string transitionText)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.transitionText = transitionText;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class TextTranstitionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private struct StartInfoDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public StartInfo(string initialText, string finalText, int timeStep)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.initialText = initialText;Di2015NewLine            this.finalText = finalText;Di2015NewLine            this.timeStep = timeStep;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private readonly string initialText;Di2015NewLine        public string InitialText { get { return this.initialText; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private readonly string finalText;Di2015NewLine        public string FinalText { get { return this.finalText; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private readonly int timeStep;Di2015NewLine        public int TimeStep { get { return this.timeStep; } }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public EventHandler<TranstitionEventArgs> TransitionFinished;Di2015NewLine    public EventHandler<TranstitionEventArgs> TransitionTicked;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void StartTransition(string initialText, string finalText, int timeStep)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StartInfo startInfo = new StartInfo(initialText, finalText, timeStep);Di2015NewLine        Thread t = new Thread(startTransition);Di2015NewLine        t.Start(startInfo);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void startTransition(object info)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StartInfo startInfo = (StartInfo)info;Di2015NewLine        string initialText = startInfo.InitialText;Di2015NewLine        string finalText = startInfo.FinalText;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (initialText.Length < finalText.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            initialText = initialText.PadRight(finalText.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (TransitionTicked != null) TransitionTicked(this, new TranstitionEventArgs(initialText));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while ((initialText = transition(initialText, finalText)) != finalText)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(startInfo.TimeStep);Di2015NewLine            if (TransitionTicked != null) TransitionTicked(this, new TranstitionEventArgs(initialText));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (TransitionFinished != null) TransitionFinished(this, new TranstitionEventArgs(finalText));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string transition(string initialText, string finalText)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder b = new StringBuilder(finalText.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < finalText.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            char c = initialText[i];Di2015NewLine            int charCode = (int)c;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (c != finalText[i])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (charCode == 122 || charCode==32) charCode = 65;Di2015NewLine                else if (charCode == 90) charCode = 97;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    charCode += 1;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            b.Append((char)charCode);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return b.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6434008Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class SecurityHandler : ICallHandlerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public IMethodReturn Invoke(IMethodInvocation input, GetNextHandlerDelegate getNext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var message = getNext()(input, getNext);Di2015NewLine        var returnType = message.ReturnValue.GetType();Di2015NewLine        if (typeof(IQueryable).IsAssignableFrom(returnType))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var entityType = returnType.GetGenericArguments().Single();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var securableAttribute = entityType.GetAttribute<SecurableTypeAttribute>();Di2015NewLine            if (securableAttribute != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Build expression to filter the list from the attribute and primary key of the entityDi2015NewLine                //Return the new IQueryableDi2015NewLine                message.ReturnValue = AddWhereExpression(Di2015NewLine                    (IQueryable)message.ReturnValue, Di2015NewLine                    securableAttribute.FilterValues,Di2015NewLine                    securableAttribute.FilterPropertyName);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return message;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Order { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IQueryable AddWhereExpression(IQueryable query, IEnumerable ids, string filterPropertyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Build this expression:Di2015NewLine        // item => ids.Contains(item.[PrimaryKeyPropertyName])Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var itemParameter = Expression.Parameter(query.ElementType, "item");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var itemParameterProperty = Expression.Property(itemParameter, filterPropertyName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var listParameter = Expression.Constant(ids);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var containsExpression = Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine            typeof(System.Linq.Enumerable),Di2015NewLine            "Contains",Di2015NewLine            new[] { typeof(int) },Di2015NewLine            listParameter,Di2015NewLine            itemParameterProperty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var delegateTypeExpression = Expression.GetFuncType(new[] { query.ElementType, typeof(bool) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var whereExpression = Expression.Lambda(Di2015NewLine            delegateTypeExpression,Di2015NewLine            containsExpression,Di2015NewLine            new[] { itemParameter }Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Expression callWhere = Expression.Call(Di2015NewLine                                     typeof(Queryable),Di2015NewLine                                     "Where",Di2015NewLine                                     new Type[] { query.ElementType },  // type args for Where<T>()Di2015NewLine                                     query.Expression,Di2015NewLine                                     whereExpressionDi2015NewLine                                     );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return query.Provider.CreateQuery(callWhere);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6434008Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class TypeExtensionsDi2015NewLine{       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static TAttribute GetAttribute<TAttribute>(this Type type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var attributes = type.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(TAttribute), true);Di2015NewLine        if (attributes.Length == 0) return default(TAttribute);Di2015NewLine        return (TAttribute)attributes[0];Di2015NewLine    }      Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static PropertyInfo GetPropertyWithAttributeValue<TAttribute>(Di2015NewLine        this IEnumerable<PropertyInfo> properties,Di2015NewLine        Func<TAttribute, bool> findPredicate)Di2015NewLine        where TAttribute : AttributeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var property = from p in propertiesDi2015NewLine                       where p.HasAttribute<TAttribute>() &&Di2015NewLine                       findPredicate.Invoke(p.GetAttribute<TAttribute>())Di2015NewLine                       select p;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return property.FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool HasAttribute<TAttribute>(this PropertyInfo propertyInfo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return propertyInfo.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(TAttribute), true).Any();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static TAttribute GetAttribute<TAttribute>(this PropertyInfo propertyInfo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var attributes = propertyInfo.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(TAttribute), true);Di2015NewLine        if (attributes.Length == 0) return default(TAttribute);Di2015NewLine        return (TAttribute)attributes[0];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6438378Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic uint CalcCheckSum(byte[] data, int PECheckSum)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    long checksum = 0;Di2015NewLine    var top = Math.Pow(2, 32);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < data.Length / 4; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (i == PECheckSum / 4)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var dword = BitConverter.ToUInt32(data, i * 4);Di2015NewLine        checksum = (checksum & 0xffffffff) + dword + (checksum >> 32);Di2015NewLine        if (checksum > top)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            checksum = (checksum & 0xffffffff) + (checksum >> 32);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    checksum = (checksum & 0xffff) + (checksum >> 16);Di2015NewLine    checksum = (checksum) + (checksum >> 16);Di2015NewLine    checksum = checksum & 0xffff;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    checksum += (uint)data.Length;Di2015NewLine    return (uint)checksum;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6440803Di2015UniqueSeparator    public string[] GetFileList(string URL)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string[] downloadFiles;Di2015NewLine                StringBuilder result =         tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    reqFTP = (FtpWebRequest)FtpWebRequest.Create(new Uri(URL));Di2015NewLine                    reqFTP.UseBinary =            result.Append(line);Di2015NewLine                        result.Append("\\n");Di2015NewLine                        line = reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    result.Remove(result.ToString().LastIndexOf('\\n'), 1);Di2015NewLine                    reader.Close();Di2015NewLine                    response.Close();Di2015NewLine classDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     public void Download(string filePath, string fileName, string URL)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                FtpWebRequest name of the file on FTP server).>>Di2015NewLine                    FileStream outputStream = new FileStream(filePathDi2015NewLine    + "\\\\" + fileName, FileMode.Create);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 500000;Di2015NewLine                    FtpWebResponse response = (FtpWebResponse)reqFTP.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine                    Stream ftpStream = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine                    long cl = response.ContentLength;Di2015NewLine                    int bufferSize = 2048;Di2015NewLine                    int readCount;Di2015NewLine                    byte[] buffer = }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    ftpStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                    outputStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                    response.Close();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    MessageBox.Show(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine

6444275Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<T> RemoveWhere<T>(this List<T> source, Func<T, bool > predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("source", "The sequence is null and contains no elements.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (predicate == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("predicate", "The predicate function is null and cannot be executed.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // how to use predicate here???Di2015NewLine    var result = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    foreach(var item in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(!predicate(item))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Add(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6444373Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal ITemplate GetTemplate(string template, Type modelType, string name)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(name))Di2015NewLine        if (templateCache.ContainsKey(name))Di2015NewLine            return templateCache[name];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var instance = CreateTemplate(template, modelType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(name))Di2015NewLine        if (!templateCache.ContainsKey(name))Di2015NewLine            templateCache.Add(name, instance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return instance;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6446665Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring mystring = "[asda$@.asd ' a12876 ]] \\"\\" ]";Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(mystring);Di2015NewLineMatchCollection matches = Di2015NewLine   Regex.Matches(mystring,Di2015NewLine                 @"[\\w@#](?:[\\w\\.\\$@#])*|\\[[\\w@#](?:\\[\\[|\\]\\]|[""\\w\\s\\.\\$@#'])*\\]|""[\\w@#](?:\\""\\""|['\\s\\[\\w\\.\\$@#\\]])*""",Di2015NewLine                 RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace);Di2015NewLineforeach (Match match in matches)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   string id = match.Value;Di2015NewLine   // The first character of the match tells us which escape sequence to useDi2015NewLine   // for the replacement.Di2015NewLine   if (match.Value[0] == '[')Di2015NewLine      id = id.Substring (1, id.Length - 2).Replace ("[[", "[").Replace ("]]", "]");Di2015NewLine   else if (match.Value[0] == '"')Di2015NewLine      id = id.Substring (1, id.Length - 2).Replace ("\\"\\"", "\\"");Di2015NewLine   Console.WriteLine (id);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6446788Di2015UniqueSeparatorimport java.util.Iterator;Di2015NewLineimport java.util.concurrent.ArrayBlockingQueue;Di2015NewLineimport java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue;Di2015NewLineimport java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic abstract class ConcurrentIterable<T> implements Iterable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static final int CAP = 1000;Di2015NewLine    private final ThreadLocal<CommunicationChannel<T>> channelsDi2015NewLine    = new ThreadLocal<CommunicationChannel<T>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    @OverrideDi2015NewLine    public Iterator<T> iterator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BlockingQueue<Option<T>> queue = new ArrayBlockingQueue<Option<T>>(CAP);Di2015NewLine        Object token = new Object();Di2015NewLine        final CommunicationChannel<T> channelDi2015NewLine        = new CommunicationChannel<T>(queue, token);Di2015NewLine        new Thread(new Runnable()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            @OverrideDi2015NewLine            public void run()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                channels.set(channel);Di2015NewLine                provideElements();Di2015NewLine                enqueueSentinel();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }).start();Di2015NewLine        return new ConcurrentIterator<T>(queue, token);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected abstract void provideElements();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected final boolean iterationAborted()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return channels.get().iterationAborted();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected final void provideElement(T element)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        enqueue(Option.some(element));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void enqueueSentinel()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        enqueue(Option.<T> none());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void enqueue(Option<T> element)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (!offer(element))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                System.gc();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (InterruptedException ignore)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ignore.printStackTrace();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private boolean offer(Option<T> element) throws InterruptedExceptionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CommunicationChannel<T> channel = channels.get();Di2015NewLine        return channel.iterationAborted()Di2015NewLine            || channel.queue.offer(element, 1, TimeUnit.SECONDS);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6446788Di2015UniqueSeparatorimport java.lang.ref.WeakReference;Di2015NewLineimport java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class CommunicationChannel<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public final BlockingQueue<Option<T>> queue;Di2015NewLine    private final WeakReference<Object> token;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CommunicationChannel(BlockingQueue<Option<T>> queue, Object token)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.queue = queue;Di2015NewLine        this.token = new WeakReference<Object>(token);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public boolean iterationAborted()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return token.get() == null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6446788Di2015UniqueSeparatorimport java.util.Iterator;Di2015NewLineimport java.util.NoSuchElementException;Di2015NewLineimport java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ConcurrentIterator<T> implements Iterator<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private final BlockingQueue<Option<T>> queue;Di2015NewLine    @SuppressWarnings("unused")Di2015NewLine    private final Object token;Di2015NewLine    private Option<T> next;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ConcurrentIterator(BlockingQueue<Option<T>> queue, Object token)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.queue = queue;Di2015NewLine        this.token = token;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    @OverrideDi2015NewLine    public boolean hasNext()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (next == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                next = queue.take();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (InterruptedException ignore)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ignore.printStackTrace();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return next.present;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    @OverrideDi2015NewLine    public T next()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!hasNext()) throw new NoSuchElementException();Di2015NewLine        T result = next.value;Di2015NewLine        next = null;Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    @OverrideDi2015NewLine    public void remove()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6446788Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Option<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public final T value;Di2015NewLine    public final boolean present;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Option(T value, boolean present)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.value = value;Di2015NewLine        this.present = present;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static <T> Option<T> some(T value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Option<T>(value, true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")Di2015NewLine    public static <T> Option<T> none()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return none;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    @SuppressWarnings({ "rawtypes", "unchecked" })Di2015NewLine    private static final Option none = new Option(null, false);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6448980Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // usage program.exe page#Di2015NewLine        // page# between 1 and 100Di2015NewLine        int minPage = 1;Di2015NewLine        int maxPage = 100;Di2015NewLine        int currentPage = int.Parse(args[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // output nice paginationDi2015NewLine        // always have a group of 5Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int minRange = Math.Max(minPage, currentPage-2);Di2015NewLine        int maxRange = Math.Min(maxPage, currentPage+2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (minRange != minPage)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(minPage);Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("...");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = minRange; i <= maxRange; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(i);Di2015NewLine            if (i != maxRange) Console.Write(" ");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (maxRange != maxPage)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("...");Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(maxPage);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6449370Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int SECOND = 1;Di2015NewLineconst int MINUTE = 60 * SECOND;Di2015NewLineconst int HOUR = 60 * MINUTE;Di2015NewLineconst int DAY = 24 * HOUR;Di2015NewLineconst int MONTH = 30 * DAY;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (delta < 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return "not yet";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (delta < 1 * MINUTE)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return ts.Seconds == 1 ? "one second ago" : ts.Seconds + " seconds ago";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (delta < 2 * MINUTE)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return "a minute ago";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (delta < 45 * MINUTE)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return ts.Minutes + " minutes ago";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (delta < 90 * MINUTE)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return "an hour ago";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (delta < 24 * HOUR)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return ts.Hours + " hours ago";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (delta < 48 * HOUR)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return "yesterday";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (delta < 30 * DAY)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return ts.Days + " days ago";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineif (delta < 12 * MONTH)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int months = Convert.ToInt32(Math.Floor((double)ts.Days / 30));Di2015NewLine  return months <= 1 ? "one month ago" : months + " months ago";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  int years = Convert.ToInt32(Math.Floor((double)ts.Days / 365));Di2015NewLine  return years <= 1 ? "one year ago" : years + " years ago";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6450219Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool IsValid(string username, string password)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var conn = new OdbcConnection("host=localhost;usr=root;password=admin;db=timekeeping;"))Di2015NewLine    using (var cmd = conn.CreateCommand())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        conn.Open();Di2015NewLine        cmd.CommandText = "SELECT count(*) FROM receptionist WHERE username = @username AND password = @password;";Di2015NewLine        cmd.Parameters.AddWithValue("@username", username);Di2015NewLine        cmd.Parameters.AddWithValue("@password", password);Di2015NewLine        var count = (long)cmd.ExecuteScalar();Di2015NewLine        return count > 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Validator(string schemaPath)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            WarningAsErrors = true;Di2015NewLine            logger = LogManager.GetLogger(GetType().Name);Di2015NewLine            schemaset = new XmlSchemaSet();Di2015NewLine            foreach (string s in Directory.GetFiles(schemaPath, "*.xsd"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                schemaset.Add(XmlSchema.Read(XmlReader.Create(s),new ValidationEventHandler((ss,e)=>OnValidateReadSchema(ss,e))));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            instance = this;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void OnValidateReadSchema(object ss, ValidationEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (e.Severity == XmlSeverityType.Error)Di2015NewLine                logger.Error(e.Message);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                logger.Warn(e.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public bool WarningAsErrors { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        private string FormatLineInfo(XmlSchemaException xmlSchemaException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Format(" Line:{0} Position:{1}", xmlSchemaException.LineNumber, xmlSchemaException.LinePosition);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        protected void OnValidate(object _, ValidationEventArgs vae)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (vae.Severity == XmlSeverityType.Error)Di2015NewLine                logger.Error(vae.Message);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                logger.Warn(vae.Message);Di2015NewLine            if (vae.Severity == XmlSeverityType.Error || WarningAsErrors)Di2015NewLine                errors.AppendLine(vae.Message + FormatLineInfo(vae.Exception));Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                warnings.AppendLine(vae.Message + FormatLineInfo(vae.Exception));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string ErrorMessage { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string WarningMessage { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder errors, warnings;Di2015NewLine        public void Validate(String doc)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (lockObject)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                errors = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine                warnings = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                XmlReaderSettings settings = new XmlReaderSettings();Di2015NewLine                settings.CloseInput = true;Di2015NewLine                settings.ValidationEventHandler += new ValidationEventHandler((o, e) => OnValidate(o, e)); 6453923Di2015UniqueSeparator string inp = @"1: A C DDi2015NewLine            4: A BDi2015NewLine            5: D FDi2015NewLine            7: A EDi2015NewLine            9: B C";Di2015NewLine            Dictionary<string, List<int>> res = new Dictionary<string, List<int>>();Di2015NewLine            StringReader sr = new StringReader(inp);Di2015NewLine            string line;Di2015NewLine            while (null != (line = sr.ReadLine()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(line))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string[] tokens = line.Split(": ".ToArray(),StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLine                    int idx = int.Parse(tokens[0]);Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = 1; i < tokens.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (!res.ContainsKey(tokens[i]))Di2015NewLine                            res[tokens[i]] = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine                        res[tokens[i]].Add(int.Parse(tokens[0]));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine

6455369Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool IsConnectedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    getDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //return _tcpClient != null && _tcpClient.Client != null && _tcpClient.Client.Connected;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (_tcpClient != null && _tcpClient.Client != null && _tcpClient.Client.Connected)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                /* As the documentation:Di2015NewLine                    * When passing SelectMode.SelectRead as a parameter to the Poll method it will return Di2015NewLine                    * -either- true if Socket.Listen(Int32) has been called and a connection is pending;Di2015NewLine                    * -or- true if data is available for reading; Di2015NewLine                    * -or- true if the connection has been closed, reset, or terminated; Di2015NewLine                    * otherwise, returns falseDi2015NewLine                    */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Detect if client disconnectedDi2015NewLine                if (_tcpClient.Client.Poll(0, SelectMode.SelectRead))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    byte[] buff = new byte[1];Di2015NewLine                    if (_tcpClient.Client.Receive(buff, SocketFlags.Peek) == 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Client disconnectedDi2015NewLine                        return false;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return true;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6456108Di2015UniqueSeparator// Create a class to hold the information you want to bind, Di2015NewLine// you could use anonymous types if preferredDi2015NewLineclass MyDataRowDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public long ID { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string AnotherColumn { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string AndAnotherColumn { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// then later on when creating that list use something along the lines of:Di2015NewLineList<MyDataRow> myList = dt.DefaultDataView.ToTable(True, "ID").AsEnumerable().Select(x => new MyDataRow { ID = x.ID }).ToList()Di2015NewLine// you now have a list of MyDataRow which you can work withDi2015NewLine// for example...Di2015NewLineif (myList.Any())Di2015NewLine    myList.First().AnotherColumn = "foo";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// as an exmaple of using an anoymous type (not my preference, but an option nonetheless)Di2015NewLinevar anonymousList = dt.DefaultDataView.ToTable(True, "ID").AsEnumerable().Select(x => new { ID = x.ID, whateverYouWantToCallIt = "some other data but this is read only property" }).ToList()Di2015NewLine// you can work with the anonymous list in much the same way, it just isn't explicitly declaredDi2015NewLine// and the properties are Read OnlyDi2015NewLineif (anonymousList.Any())Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(anonymousList.First().whateverYouWantToCallIt);Di2015NewLine

6456494Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// ... You will want this in your own namespace not mine. ;-)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine///<summary>Di2015NewLine/// Copies properties with the same name and type from one object to another.Di2015NewLine///</summary>Di2015NewLine///<typeparam name="TFirst">The object type to copy from.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine///<typeparam name="TSecond">The object type to copy to.</typeparam>Di2015NewLinepublic class PropertyCopier<TFirst, TSecond> Di2015NewLine    where TFirst : classDi2015NewLine    where TSecond : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly TFirst _first;Di2015NewLine    private readonly TSecond _second;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ///<summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Creates an instance of the PropertyCopier.Di2015NewLine    ///</summary>Di2015NewLine    ///<param name="first">The object to copy properties from.</param>Di2015NewLine    ///<param name="second">The object to copy properties to.</param>Di2015NewLine    ///<exception cref="ArgumentNullException">An <see cref="ArgumentNullException"/> will be thrown ifDi2015NewLine    /// the source or destination objects are null.</exception>Di2015NewLine    public PropertyCopier(TFirst first, TSecond second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ( first == null )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("first");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (second == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("second");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _first = first;Di2015NewLine        _second = second;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ///<summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Performs the copy operation.Di2015NewLine    ///</summary>Di2015NewLine    public void Copy()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Copy(p => true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ///<summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Performs the copy operation, omitting any items for which the predicate evaluates to false.Di2015NewLine    ///</summary>Di2015NewLine    ///<param name="predicate">A predicate based on the <see cref="PropertyInfo"/> used to determine if the property should be copied.</param>Di2015NewLine    ///<exception cref="ArgumentException">An <see cref="ArgumentException"/> may be thrown if the copy cannot be performed.Di2015NewLine    /// This may happen if, for example, there is a property with the same name but a different type.</exception>Di2015NewLine    public void Copy(Predicate<PropertyInfo> predicate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo info in typeof(TFirst).GetProperties())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PropertyInfo infoInDestination = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                infoInDestination = typeof(TSecond).GetProperty(info.Name, info.PropertyType);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (AmbiguousMatchException)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (infoInDestination != null && infoInDestination.CanWrite && predicate(infoInDestination))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    infoInDestination.SetValue(_second, info.GetValue(_first, null), null);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException(String.Format("Unable to copy property called {0}", info.Name), e);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6456738Di2015UniqueSeparatortreeView1.AddLinkedTreeView(treeView2);Di2015NewLine
6456738Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class MyTreeView : TreeViewDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public MyTreeView() : base()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<MyTreeView> linkedTreeViews = new List<MyTreeView>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Links the specified tree view to this tree view.  Whenever either treeviewDi2015NewLine    /// scrolls, the other will scroll too.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="treeView">The TreeView to link.</param>Di2015NewLine    public void AddLinkedTreeView(MyTreeView treeView)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (treeView == this)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Cannot link a TreeView to itself!", "treeView");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!linkedTreeViews.Contains(treeView))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //add the treeview to our list of linked treeviewsDi2015NewLine            linkedTreeViews.Add(treeView);Di2015NewLine            //add this to the treeview's list of linked treeviewsDi2015NewLine            treeView.AddLinkedTreeView(this);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //make sure the TreeView is linked to all of the other TreeViews that this TreeView is linked toDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < linkedTreeViews.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //get the linked treeviewDi2015NewLine                var linkedTreeView = linkedTreeViews[i];Di2015NewLine                //link the treeviews togetherDi2015NewLine                if (linkedTreeView != treeView)Di2015NewLine                    linkedTreeView.AddLinkedTreeView(treeView);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Sets the destination's scroll positions to that of the source.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="source">The source of the scroll positions.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="dest">The destinations to set the scroll positions for.</param>Di2015NewLine    private void SetScrollPositions(MyTreeView source, MyTreeView dest)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //get the scroll positions of the sourceDi2015NewLine        int horizontal = User32.GetScrollPos(source.Handle, Orientation.Horizontal);Di2015NewLine        int vertical = User32.GetScrollPos(source.Handle, Orientation.Vertical);Di2015NewLine        //set the scroll positions of the destinationDi2015NewLine        User32.SetScrollPos(dest.Handle, Orientation.Horizontal, horizontal, true);Di2015NewLine        User32.SetScrollPos(dest.Handle, Orientation.Vertical, vertical, true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void WndProc(ref Message m)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //process the messageDi2015NewLine        base.WndProc(ref m);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //pass scroll messages onto any linked viewsDi2015NewLine        if (m.Msg == User32.WM_VSCROLL || m.Msg == User32.WM_MOUSEWHEEL)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var linkedTreeView in linkedTreeViews)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //set the scroll positions of the linked tree viewDi2015NewLine                SetScrollPositions(this, linkedTreeView);Di2015NewLine                //copy the windows messageDi2015NewLine                Message copy = new MessageDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    HWnd = linkedTreeView.Handle,Di2015NewLine                    LParam = m.LParam,Di2015NewLine                    Msg = m.Msg,Di2015NewLine                    Result = m.Result,Di2015NewLine                    WParam = m.WParamDi2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine                //pass the message onto the linked tree viewDi2015NewLine                linkedTreeView.RecieveWndProc(ref copy);Di2015NewLine            }                               Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Recieves a WndProc message without passing it onto any linked treeviews.  This is useful to avoid infinite loops.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="m">The windows message.</param>Di2015NewLine    private void RecieveWndProc(ref Message m)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.WndProc(ref m);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Imported functions from the User32.dllDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private class User32Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public const int WM_VSCROLL = 0x115;Di2015NewLine        public const int WM_MOUSEWHEEL = 0x020A;  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("user32.dll", CharSet = CharSet.Auto)]Di2015NewLine        public static extern int GetScrollPos(IntPtr hWnd, System.Windows.Forms.Orientation nBar);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine        public static extern int SetScrollPos(IntPtr hWnd, System.Windows.Forms.Orientation nBar, int nPos, bool bRedraw);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6458023Di2015UniqueSeparator public static List<String> GetSystemDriverList()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<string> names = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine            // get system dsn'sDi2015NewLine            Microsoft.Win32.RegistryKey reg = (Microsoft.Win32.Registry.LocalMachine).OpenSubKey("Software");Di2015NewLine            if (reg != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                reg = reg.OpenSubKey("ODBC");Di2015NewLine                if (reg != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    reg = reg.OpenSubKey("ODBCINST.INI");Di2015NewLine                    if (reg != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        reg = reg.OpenSubKey("ODBC Drivers");Di2015NewLine                        if (reg != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            // Get all DSN entries defined in DSN_LOC_IN_REGISTRY.Di2015NewLine                            foreach (string sName in reg.GetValueNames())Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                names.Add(sName);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        tryDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            reg.Close();Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        catch { /* ignore this exception if we couldn't close */ }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return names;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

6462040Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace AmazonDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class AmazonSigningMessageInspector : IClientMessageInspector {Di2015NewLine        private string    accessKeyId    = "";Di2015NewLine        private string    secretKey    = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public AmazonSigningMessageInspector(string accessKeyId, string secretKey) {Di2015NewLine            this.accessKeyId    = accessKeyId;Di2015NewLine            this.secretKey        = secretKey;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public object BeforeSendRequest(ref Message request, IClientChannel channel) {Di2015NewLine            // prepare the data to signDi2015NewLine            string        operation        = Regex.Match(request.Headers.Action, "[^/]+$").ToString();Di2015NewLine            DateTime    now                = DateTime.UtcNow;Di2015NewLine            string        timestamp        = now.ToString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ");Di2015NewLine            string        signMe            = operation + timestamp;Di2015NewLine            byte[]        bytesToSign        = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(signMe);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // sign the dataDi2015NewLine            byte[]        secretKeyBytes    = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(secretKey);Di2015NewLine            HMAC        hmacSha256        = new HMACSHA256(secretKeyBytes);Di2015NewLine            byte[]        hashBytes        = hmacSha256.ComputeHash(bytesToSign);Di2015NewLine            string        signature        = Convert.ToBase64String(hashBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // add the signature information to the request headersDi2015NewLine            request.Headers.Add(new AmazonHeader("AWSAccessKeyId", accessKeyId));Di2015NewLine            request.Headers.Add(new AmazonHeader("Timestamp", timestamp));Di2015NewLine            request.Headers.Add(new AmazonHeader("Signature", signature));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void AfterReceiveReply(ref Message reply, object correlationState) { }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6462282Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Markup;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Data;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.ObjectModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Test.MarkupExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [ContentProperty("Filters")]Di2015NewLine    class FilterExtension : MarkupExtensionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly Collection<IFilter> _filters = new Collection<IFilter>();Di2015NewLine        public ICollection<IFilter> Filters { get { return _filters; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override object ProvideValue(IServiceProvider serviceProvider)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return new FilterEventHandler((s, e) =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var filter in Filters)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        var res = filter.Filter(e.Item);Di2015NewLine                        if (!res)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            e.Accepted = false;Di2015NewLine                            return;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    e.Accepted = true;Di2015NewLine                });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public interface IFilterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool Filter(object item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
6462282Di2015UniqueSeparator    // Sketchy Example FilterDi2015NewLine    public class PropertyFilter : DependencyObject, IFilterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static readonly DependencyProperty PropertyNameProperty =Di2015NewLine            DependencyProperty.Register("PropertyName", typeof(string), typeof(PropertyFilter), new UIPropertyMetadata(null));Di2015NewLine        public string PropertyNameDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return (string)GetValue(PropertyNameProperty); }Di2015NewLine            set { SetValue(PropertyNameProperty, value); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public static readonly DependencyProperty ValueProperty =Di2015NewLine            DependencyProperty.Register("Value", typeof(object), typeof(PropertyFilter), new UIPropertyMetadata(null));Di2015NewLine        public object ValueDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return (object)GetValue(ValueProperty); }Di2015NewLine            set { SetValue(ValueProperty, value); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public static readonly DependencyProperty RegexPatternProperty =Di2015NewLine            DependencyProperty.Register("RegexPattern", typeof(string), typeof(PropertyFilter), new UIPropertyMetadata(null));Di2015NewLine        public string RegexPatternDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return (string)GetValue(RegexPatternProperty); }Di2015NewLine            set { SetValue(RegexPatternProperty, value); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Filter(object item)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var type = item.GetType();Di2015NewLine            var itemValue = type.GetProperty(PropertyName).GetValue(item, null);Di2015NewLine            if (RegexPattern == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return (object.Equals(itemValue, Value));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (itemValue is string == false)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("Cannot match non-string with regex.");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return Regex.Match((string)itemValue, RegexPattern).Success;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6464324Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void t1Start()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("t1Start started,  Mutex.WaitAll(Mutex[])");Di2015NewLine    Mutex[] gMs = new Mutex[2] { gM1, gM2 };Di2015NewLine    Mutex.WaitAll(gMs);  // Waits until both gM1 and gM2 are releasedDi2015NewLine    Thread.Sleep(2000);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("t1Start finished, Mutex.WaitAll(Mutex[]) satisfied");Di2015NewLine    Event1.Set();      // AutoResetEvent.Set() flagging method is doneDi2015NewLine    gM1.ReleaseMutex();Di2015NewLine    gM2.ReleaseMutex();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void t2Start()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("t2Start started,  gM1.WaitOne( )");Di2015NewLine    gM1.WaitOne();    // Waits until Mutex gM1 is releasedDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("t2Start finished, gM1.WaitOne( ) satisfied");Di2015NewLine    Event2.Set();     // AutoResetEvent.Set() flagging method is doneDi2015NewLine    gM1.ReleaseMutex();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void t3Start()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("t3Start started,  Mutex.WaitAny(Mutex[])");Di2015NewLine    Mutex[] gMs = new Mutex[2] { gM1, gM2 };Di2015NewLine    int mxObtained = Mutex.WaitAny(gMs);  // Waits until either Mutex is releasedDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("t3Start finished, Mutex.WaitAny(Mutex[])");Di2015NewLine    Event3.Set();       // AutoResetEvent.Set() flagging method is doneDi2015NewLine    gMs[mxObtained].ReleaseMutex();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void t4Start()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("t4Start started,  gM2.WaitOne( )");Di2015NewLine    gM2.WaitOne();   // Waits until Mutex gM2 is releasedDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("t4Start finished, gM2.WaitOne( )");Di2015NewLine    Event4.Set();    // AutoResetEvent.Set() flagging method is doneDi2015NewLine    gM2.ReleaseMutex();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
